verbs.description: asian economies grateful for reprieve on iran oil imports [V: japan] south korea and other major oil importers welcomed tuesday the decision by the trump administration to let them continue to import iranian crude oil and other petroleum products despite the re - imposition of sanctions on tehran the risk of excessive disruption to world markets was a key factor behind the decision to allow exemptions for some of the biggest most oil - thirsty economies it appeared to have paid off iran trump u s india persian gulf china japan taiwan president donald trump asalouyeh seoul saudi arabia tokyo asia tehran south korea u s treasury department prime minister theresa may
